tracks.text: Text moves through space
Break Free, Ariana Grande featuring Zedd. Directed by Chris Marrs Piliero
A small station on red craggy planet with 2 moons.
Ariana Grande wears a beige leotard with geometric decorations. On her hip, she has a metal emblem of 3 interlocking V's. She throws the emblem on the ground and steps on it.
She sings to us in an octagonal hallway covered in fluorescent light.
She walks out of the station, carrying a gun.
Humans stand in cages. Frog faced aliens with guns keep watch.
The caged humans look despondent.
The frog aliens wear the metal emblem on their jackets. They fall, shot in the chest. Grande is behind them, gun in hand.
The humans gather around Grande, jumping and dancing
Grande is surrounded by 3 aliens with guns.
2 aliens fire. Grande ducks, and their green lasers hit each other.
The third alien shoots. Grande round house kicks him to the ground.
She steps on his chest and shoots him in the face.
Floating in a zero gravity living room, Grande disrobes. Her gloves float nearby.
Outside, Grande turns from the shot aliens to see a giant robot with the metal emblem.
She pushes her hair back. 2 missiles fire from her chest.
The missiles explode in the robot's chest, knocking it back.
The robot lifts a hand and fires. The hand catches Grande and flies away with her.
A bald man in a long flowing coat stands in front of a fire pit. Behind the pit, Grande is chained between 2 rocks with the emblem.
She struggles. The bald man turns around. He has a long white beard and bushy eyebrows. He throws his head back and laughs. He wears an interlocking symbol around his neck.
Grande pulls the chains and they break.
She grabs the bald man, and pushes him into the fire pit.
Floating in a living room, she wears a crop top and mini skirt made of shiny, geometric shapes.
A tube floats to her
A pink laser emerges from the tube. She uses it to apply lipstick.
She gets beamed up from the planet.
She lands in a control room of a spaceship, which flies off.
At a control station, Zedd DJ's. The humans that Grande freed stand around and dance.
2 aliens kiss. Grande sits on a control center and kicks her platform stilettos in the air.
A small alien with 6 legs and a green elephant nose sits on a table. Grande sings to it.
The 6 legged alien sits in front of a Bose speaker. Grande presses a button on an iphone app, then kisses the alien on the forehead.
Zedd wears blue Bose headphones. Grande wears pink ones, which are plugged in to Zedd's.
Zedd puts a device with an interlocking symbol into the control panel, and it glows.
The space ship warps into space. Fade to black.
